Oliver Engel – Design systems & product design

Wanna chat?

Open to side projects, questions, or anything else.

Designing software in Seattle.
Lover of 80’s music, thrift stores, good typography, and BBQ.

Hello, Internet user. I’m Oliver – a Senior Product Designer working on design systems at Handshake.

I grew up in the Bay Area, studied art and computer science at UC San Diego, and received a Master’s degree in human-computer interaction and design from the University of Washington. In my free time, I publish free resources for designers on Figma Community. I recently released The Interview Kit, a comprehensive guide to getting a job in product design.

If you're looking for my full portfolio, feel free to reach out below.
